channel.title: AltNetBrum on csMACnz's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in AltNetBrum on csMACnz's Blog

item.title: Geeking out on a Saturday at the Birmingham Alt.Net Unconference
item.description: Unlike some unfortunate people who found out on the day and missed out, I had the opportunity to attend the Alt.Net Unconference in Birmingham this Saturday. Now I know some of you think Saturday Conferences are too far outside your work time. But hear me out on this first. This is a free event, which means no expensive expense approval. It included lunch so no personal cost apart from transport to get there.
